subject: Parenting
title: The Invention of the Nursery
description: A quick win: understand The Invention of the Nursery.

hook.text: Before the 1600s, children slept with adults, ate with adults, and lived in adult spaces entirely.

climax.text: Today's debates about co-sleeping vs separate rooms echo this 400-year-old shift in thinking.
